attributes.action: Update the Sex Education Curriculum: End the UK’s Rape Culture
attributes.additional_details: Violence towards womxn and girls is an ongoing problem that needs to change. Womxn should feel safe during sexual encounters, both inside and outside the home. By teaching these topics early on, children will grow up with them normalised into their everyday routines and lives. Healthy sex will be normal sex. Not only to save countless womxn against sexual violence, but to not breed another generation of abusive men.
